fields.name: ||Ability||
fields.value: ||Permanent +100% Luck, +10% Luck every 10 levels (Max +50%), -33 Max Health, -10% MoveSpeed, -10% Area, -50% Speed, -10% Duration, +10% Cooldown.||

fields.name: ||Unlock||
fields.value:
||1 - Have **Exdash** and **Toastie** Unlocked
2 - In the main menu, type 'spam' and press start
3 - In character selection type 'spam' and enter twice
4 - In stage selection type 'spam' and enter twice
5 - As soon as you're in-game, type 'humbug'||
